refnamediv.refpurpose: How to select objects in Scicos editor.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Many Scicos GUI menus operates on selected objects.
To select a single object (Block, Link or Text) in the current Scicos window it is enough to press the left mouse button over it.
Selected objects are displayed with small square grips drawn at the block corners and at the link boundaries and intermediate points.

To select several objects it is either possible to process as above for each object pressing the [CTRL] key or to drag a rectangle over the desired objects: press left on a point which is not over an object to select the corner of the rectangle then drag the mouse to make the rectangle include all the desired objects and release the mouse button.
Both methods can be combined to produce the desired selection.
Internal links (links going from a selected block to another selected block) are automatically included in the selection.
